title: Wyze Switch, 2.4 GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch, Single-Pole, Needs Neutral Wire, Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant, and IFTTT, No Hub Required, 3-Pack, White
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: Smart Grouping: Group multiple smart devices together in the Wyze app to control them with just a tap. Use Wyze Switch to control your other Wyze smart things: lock your doors, turn on a floor lamp, even change the color temperature of your smart bulbs.
Tap Dance: Use the Wyze app to set up more interactions: add a double tap to dim the lights, triple tap to change the color temperature of smart bulbs, or press and hold to turn on a smart plug.
All Inclusive: Wyze Switch doesn’t discriminate. If you already have smart products from another company, Wyze Switch can interact with them by integrating with IFTTT.

Automate Your Life: Use the Wyze app to set schedules and timers for the lights and smart devices controlled by Wyze Switch. Turn on your kitchen lights and start your coffee pot exactly at 6AM every morning, all without lifting your feet out of bed.
Light, on Command: Wyze Switch works with Alexa, Google Assistant, and Siri so whether your hands are full or you don’t want to move from that comfy chair, your voice is now your light switch.
